item.title: The OTHER 800 Page Book About a Wizard
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: I'm reading The Clinton Wars by Sidney Blumenthal right now. I'm almost halfway done but my Harry Potter is due to arrive any day now and I'm afraid once I put this tome down I may not go back. For as lengthy as it is, I find myself wishing Blumenthal would go into more character detail about the players. The book is really starting to pick up now that I have reached the period where the author has joined the staff. ...and if you ever thought there was anything *but* a right-wing conspiracy, you should read this book.
